label: title
text: Hi there, I am your site title

label: desc
text: I am another text box. You can click us once to move or resize me, click again to edit my text.

label: sidebar
text:
Some sidebar text. Note that when these words are accessed via the API, it doesn't matter how they are arranged on the page.
But it will help others to know how text you define here maps to your web page or app.

label: styleNotice
text:
I might well be some text that refers to a disclaimer*.
Note that this page is all about the words. The style of the text has no affect on the final home for the words.

label: disclaimer
text: * Before relying on the material in any important matter, users should carefully evaluate its accuracy, currency, completeness and relevance for their purposes, and should obtain any appropriate professional advice relevant to their particular circumstances.
